message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $9500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I would like to counterpropose a price of $8000 for the product.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9000. I think it's a fair price for this amazing product.
I understand your position, Alice. While I respect your valuation of the product, I am unable to agree to $9000. I would like to propose a final offer of $8500 for the product.
